title: Dynamic Bayesian Optimization Framework for Instruction Tuning in Partial Differential Equation Discovery
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) show promise for equation discovery, yet their outputs are highly sensitive to prompt phrasing, a phenomenon we term instruction brittleness. Static prompts cannot adapt to the evolving state of a multi-step generation process, causing models to plateau at suboptimal solutions.
